# GitHub Copilot Firewall Allowlist for Intelluxe AI Healthcare System
# This file configures network access for healthcare AI development
# 
# Usage: Configure this allowlist in GitHub repository settings under:
# Settings → Copilot → Firewall Configuration
#
# Format: Each line represents a domain that should be accessible
# Supports both DNS names and service records

# Ubuntu Package Repositories (Critical for apt-get operations)
archive.ubuntu.com
azure.archive.ubuntu.com
security.ubuntu.com
esm.ubuntu.com
motd.ubuntu.com
ports.ubuntu.com
keyserver.ubuntu.com
launchpad.net
_http._tcp.archive.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.archive.ubuntu.com
_http._tcp.azure.archive.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.azure.archive.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.security.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.esm.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.motd.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.ports.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.keyserver.ubuntu.com
_https._tcp.launchpad.net

# Microsoft Package Repository (VS Code, .NET tools)
packages.microsoft.com
_https._tcp.packages.microsoft.com

# GitHub Infrastructure (Source control, releases, CI/CD)
github.com
api.github.com
raw.githubusercontent.com
objects.githubusercontent.com
codeload.github.com
_https._tcp.github.com
_https._tcp.api.github.com
_https._tcp.raw.githubusercontent.com
_https._tcp.objects.githubusercontent.com
_https._tcp.codeload.github.com

# Docker Infrastructure (Healthcare container images)
registry-1.docker.io.
index.docker.io.
docker.io.
_https._tcp.registry-1.docker.io.
_https._tcp.index.docker.io.
_https._tcp.docker.io.

# Python Package Index (Healthcare AI dependencies)
pypi.org.
files.pythonhosted.org.
_https._tcp.pypi.org.
_https._tcp.files.pythonhosted.org.

# Node.js Infrastructure (n8n healthcare workflow automation)
registry.npmjs.org.
nodejs.org.
_https._tcp.registry.npmjs.org.
_https._tcp.nodejs.org.

# Go Language Infrastructure (Development tools)
go.dev.
_https._tcp.go.dev.

# Additional Development Tools
astral.sh.
get.docker.com.
_https._tcp.astral.sh.
_https._tcp.get.docker.com.

# Healthcare AI Model Repositories
huggingface.co.
cdn-lfs.huggingface.co.
_https._tcp.huggingface.co.
_https._tcp.cdn-lfs.huggingface.co.

# Ollama (Local LLM infrastructure)
ollama.com.
registry.ollama.ai.
_https._tcp.ollama.com.
_https._tcp.registry.ollama.ai.

# PostgreSQL (Healthcare data management)
download.postgresql.org.
ftp.postgresql.org.
_https._tcp.download.postgresql.org.
_https._tcp.ftp.postgresql.org.

# Redis (Healthcare session management)
download.redis.io.
_https._tcp.download.redis.io.

# Medical Research APIs (Read-only, no PHI)
pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov.
clinicaltrials.gov.
api.fda.gov.
_https._tcp.pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov.
_https._tcp.clinicaltrials.gov.
_https._tcp.api.fda.gov.

# VS Code and Development Tools
marketplace.visualstudio.com.
vscode.dev.
code.visualstudio.com.
_https._tcp.marketplace.visualstudio.com.
_https._tcp.vscode.dev.
_https._tcp.code.visualstudio.com.

# Git and Version Control
git-scm.com.
_https._tcp.git-scm.com.

# Healthcare Compliance and Security Tools
cve.mitre.org.
nvd.nist.gov.
_https._tcp.cve.mitre.org.
_https._tcp.nvd.nist.gov.
